amendment.description: To create a reserve fund for the establishment of a Bipartisan Medicaid Commission to consider and recommend appropriate reforms to the Medicaid program, and to strike Medicaid cuts to protect states and vulnerable populations.

action.text: Amendment SA 204 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Smith.

vote.text: Amendment SA 204 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 58.
